attributes.action: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to reintroduce the 25 year rolling car tax exemption for historic cars.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The government protects historic buildings and trees by listing them, they do not do anything to protect the history of cars. They use environmental issues to prevent the 25 year rule coming in. 70% of a cars co2 is produced during its manufacture, so surely keeping cars on the road for as long as possible is good for the environmet.
